Package blockchain

Class BlockChain

java.lang.Object
blockchain.BlockChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BlockChain extends Object implements Serializable
Constructor to create a new blockchain with a specified difficulty level.
See Also:

      public boolean isValidNewBlock(Block newBlock, Block previousBlock)
      Validates a new block before adding it to the blockchain.
      Parameters:
      newBlock - The new block to validate.
      previousBlock - The previous block in the blockchain.
      Returns:
      True if the new block is valid, false otherwise.

      public boolean isValidMissingChain(List<Block> incomingBlocks)
      Validates a received missing chain before adding it to the blockchain.
      Parameters:
      incomingBlocks - The missing chain received from another node.
      Returns:
      True if the missing chain is valid, false otherwise.

    • calculateWorkFromBlock

      private long calculateWorkFromBlock(Block startBlock)
      Calculates the total work from a given block to the end of the chain.
      Parameters:
      startBlock - The block to start calculating work from.
      Returns:
      The total work from the start block to the end of the chain.

    • addMissingChain

      public void addMissingChain(Block block, List<Block> incomingBlocks)
      Adds a missing chain to the blockchain after validating it.
      Parameters:
      block - The block that triggered the request for a missing chain.
      incomingBlocks - The missing chain received from another node.

    • getChain

      public List<Block> getChain()
      Retrieves the current blockchain.
      Returns:
      The current blockchain.

    • replaceChain

      public void replaceChain(List<Block> newChain)
      Replaces the current blockchain with a new chain.
      Parameters:
      newChain - The new chain to replace the current blockchain.

    • containsTransaction

      public boolean containsTransaction(String transaction)
      Checks if the blockchain contains a specific transaction.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to check for in the blockchain.
      Returns:
      True if the transaction is in the blockchain, false otherwise.

    • containsTransactions

      public boolean containsTransactions(List<String> transactions)
      Checks if the blockchain contains a list of transactions.
      Parameters:
      transactions - The list of transactions to check for in the blockchain.
      Returns:
      True if all transactions are in the blockchain, false otherwise.

    • findMissingChainByHash

      public List<Block> findMissingChainByHash(String hash)
      Finds a missing chain in the blockchain by a given hash.
      Parameters:
      hash - The hash of the block to find in the blockchain.
      Returns:
      The missing chain from the block with the given hash to the end of the blockchain.

      Checks if the blockchain is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the blockchain is empty, false otherwise.
